user.title: Set up Bureau of Meteorology
user.description: Latitude and longitude will be used to find the nearest weather station and to generate a forecast for your location.

observations.title: Customise Observation Sensors
observations.description: If you do not wish to create any observation sensors, uncheck the box below.

observations_monitored.title: Customise Observation Sensors
observations_monitored.description: You can customise the basename of your observation sensors and which observation sensors you would like to create.

data.observations_basename: Basename for all of your observation sensors
data.observations_monitored: Which sensors would you like to create?

forecasts.title: Customise Forecast Sensors
forecasts.description: If you do not wish to create any forecast sensors, uncheck the box below.

forecasts_monitored.title: Customise Forecast Sensors
forecasts_monitored.description: You can customise the basename of your forecast sensors, which forecast sensors you would like to create, and how many days you would like the forecast to be (day 5 is always available, day 6 and 7 are only sometimes available).

data.forecasts_basename: Choose a 'basename' for your forecast sensors (e.g. sensor.basename_temp_max_0)
data.forecasts_monitored: Which sensors would you like to create?
data.forecasts_days: How many forecast days would you like? (0-7)
